job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience

jd: Need candidates from New England region only. Please share suitable resumes. Job Role: ETL Informatica IICS AWS Developer Location: Quincy, MA (Onsite or Hybrid or Remote): Hybrid – 2-3 days (Relocation Allowed or Relocation not Allowed): Need candidates only from New England states. Contract Duration: 12+ months Qualifications: Required Qualifications: Experience: 5+ years in database development, with a focus on SQL code. AWS Knowledge: Thorough understanding of AWS Data Warehousing applications. Technical Skills: Proficient in Oracle and Snowflake SQL. Hands-on experience with cloud-based architectures. Skilled in Informatica IICS and Airflow. Familiarity with version control practices using GitHub. Exposure to multi-terabyte data warehouses. Additional Knowledge: Knowledge of Perl, database administration, storage architectures, backup and recovery processes, and basic networking. Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience. Healthcare Industry Experience: Knowledge of Medicaid or other healthcare/claims processing systems is a strong plus.
